Back to School

Come for the Back-to-School Essentials, Stay for the Easy Entertainment.
Published 02 January

The start of a new school year is more than pencils and lunch boxes, it’s the buzz of a fresh chapter, the ritual of getting organised, and the excitement of finding the perfect kit. At Watergardens, we’ve got everything in one place, so you can tick off the list and still make time for a treat (or two).

Come for the Shoes

From sturdy school shoes that can survive the playground to comfy sneakers for sports day, get them fitted and ready for action. Find the brands you know and trust like Williams, The Trybe and Sportsco all in one trip. Because new shoes mean new adventures.

 

 

Come for the Uniforms

Whether they need a size-up for growth spurts or a fresh set after playful wear-and-tear, our retailers like Best & Less and Big W have the staples sorted. Crisp polos, pleated skirts, and smart shorts plus socks and hats to match.

 

Come for the Stationery

Turn the stationery shop into an experience. From highlighters in every colour to the perfect pencil case, Smiggle and Kmart make the prep part exciting. Let them choose their favourite designs so they start term with a smile.

 

Come for the Lunch Gear

Lunchboxes that keep things fresh, drink bottles that stay cool, and snacks to fill them, all ready to go. Pick up healthy lunchbox fillers from Aldi, Woolworths or San Andres so mornings are one less stress.

 

Stay for the Moments

Once the list is ticked off, the day doesn’t have to end. Refuel with a juice or a scoop of gelato, let them burn off energy at the play area, or wander through the latest in-store displays. Back-to-school shopping done. Smiles, energy, and connection gained.
